executiveSummary: Jared Steel from Austin, Texas pitched his company Terishroom, an automated mushroom-growing device, seeking $175,000 for 2.5% equity. Despite interest in the innovative concept, all sharks declined to invest, citing overvaluation, lack of shipped products, and readiness concerns.
nextSteps: Jared plans to proceed with production and expects to ship 1,140 Terishroom units to his Austin warehouse by July.
